siteMetadata.subtitle: (Bio)Medical image analysis | Data science | Developer | Entrepreneur | Crypto enthusiast

frontmatter.title: Humane Typography in the Digital Age
frontmatter.description: An Essay on Typography by Eric Gill takes the reader back to the year 1930. The year when a conflict between two worlds came to its term. The machines of the industrial world finally took over the handicrafts.

frontmatter.title: Johannes Gutenberg: The Birth of Movable Type
frontmatter.description: German inventor Johannes Gutenberg developed a method of movable type and used it to create one of the western world’s first major printed books, the “Forty–Two–Line” Bible.
